name: National Defence Academy & Naval Academy Examination (II), 2024

Instructions: Candidates should produce the printout of their e-Admit card at the allotted venue for appearing at the Examination.
A candidate shall not be allowed to appear at any other Examination Venue except at the Examination Venue mentioned in the e-Admit Card.
No entry into the Examination Venue after closure of the entry.
Candidates are advised not to bring banned items as Venue Supervisors will not make any arrangement for keeping these items at the Venue.

Rules.Sub-rule 1: Entry of the candidates in the Venue shall be closed 30 minutes prior to the commencement of the Examination (in each session).

Rules.Sub-rule 2: No candidate shall be allowed entry into the Examination Venue after closure of the entry.
